m64tweak.description:
You will still have to place 8 red coins in your level, but put the extra red coins out of bounds.
Example: If you put 6 red coins required, you will still need to place 8 red coins in your level. Place 6 red coins wherever you want and the other 2 coins under the level or in a place where nobody can find them.
m64tweak.patch: ADDDF: [8, "Red coins required"] ADF83: [8, "Red coins required (Bowser levels) "]
